block.p: $375,000 201 East 17th Street 2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 920-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, windowed kitchen, 4 large closets, common roof deck, health club in building; maintenance $980, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $389,000, 4 weeks on market (brokers: Tabak Real Estate; Douglas Elliman)

$515,000 641 Fifth Avenue (51st Street) (Olympic Tower) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 700-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, manned-elevator, renovated kitchen, marble bath, washer/dryer in unit, health club in building; common charge $668; taxes $7,068; listed at $599,000, 15 weeks on market (brokers: Halstead Property Co.; D. J. Knight)

$750,000 134 Duane Street 1,800-sq.-ft., open-space co-op in a prewar loft building; 14-ft. ceilings, 2 sleeping lofts, home office, exposed-brick walls, hardwood floors, decorative columns, large windows, whirlpool bath, laundry room; maintenance $1,200, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $787,500, 7 weeks on market (broker: Tabak Real Estate)

$1.375 million 357 East 62nd Street 2-family, 4-story brownstone; 3 bedrooms, 1 bath, 2 fireplaces in primary duplex; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, fireplace in other; dining room, eat-in kitchen in each; 16-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $8,079; listed at $1.695 million; 26 weeks on market (brokers: Stephen A. Salmon Real Estate; Douglas Elliman)

$880,000 150 East 69th Street (Imperial House) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, manned-elevator, dining room, eat-in kitchen, central air-conditioning, terrace; maintenance $1,623, 60% tax-deductible; listed at $899,000, 17 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

$460,000 214 East 19th Street 5-bedroom, 3-bath, 85-year-old brick and wood-frame house; dining room, renovated eat-in kitchen, family room with skylight, finished basement, stained glass windows, parquet floors, 2-car garage, 75-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,150; listed at $435,000 (multiple bids), 1 week on market (broker: Mary Kay Gallagher)

$598,000 28 Bergen Street 4-family, 4-story house; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, dining room in primary units; 1 bedroom, 1 bath, eat-in kitchen, den in others; hardwood floors in each; 22-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,419; listed at $598,000, 3 weeks on market (Joan Natale Real Estate)

$976,000 4 Julian Street 3-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 17-year-old colonial; entry hall, dining room, family room, 2 fireplaces, whirlpool and steam shower, 2-car garage, 0.55-acre lot; taxes $16,388; listed at $999,000, 15 weeks on market (brokers: Coldwell Banker/Country Properties; Houlihan Lawrence)

$402,500 138 Ridge Road 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 15-year-old ranch; entry foyer, dining room, eat-in kitchen with pantry, fireplace, 2-car garage, 1/2-acre lot; taxes $9,339; listed at $415,900, 4 weeks on market (brokers: Coldwell Banker/Realty Stars; Weichert Realty)

$1.85 million 110 Meadow Road 5-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 40-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, sitting area off master suite, whirlpool bath, terrace, 2-car garage, 1/2-acre lot; taxes $7,467; listed at $1.85 million, 3 weeks on market (brokers: Coldwell Banker/Greenwich; William Pitt Real Estate)

$773,000 113 Bayberry Lane 5-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 30-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen with pantry, family room, 2 fireplaces, new roof, rear deck, 2-acre lot; taxes $6,713; listed at $805,000, 6 weeks on market (broker: Prudential Connecticut Realty)
